Title: Day 6: 1:00 P.M. - 2:00 P.M.
Plot: Jack tries to trace Morris's location, while Fayed uses harsh tactics to gain his cooperation. Lennox contemplates his resignation in the face of Wayne's rebuke, but Reed suggests an extreme course of action that may result in a change in leadership. Wayne meets with Assad and pressures him to publicly renounce terrorism.
GuestStars: Lawton R. Metcalf,  Sam Younis,  Missy Crider,  James C. Victor,  Michael Reilly Burke,  David Hunt
